name: 人力資源發展專業實習
restrict: ◎必須先修過【IWM0073  書報討論（二）】 ◎課程開放上修
description: Students who get the internship will have to contact and consult with his or her mentoring professors during the internship. He or she will also be directed by experienced professionals in the company where offers the internship to see the corroboration of theories and the practical.
goals: It is to help the graduate students get to realize the practical human resources education and development. Students who take the course are required to work at least for 240 hours in the workplace which meets the qualification of IHRD.

methodologies.note: To discuss and share the regulation of internship processes and evaluation, including: intern hours, processing documents, experience sharing, and reports.
To join and finish human resource related intern job to work at least for 240 hours in the workplace.
To finish a internship report and share that with faculty and classmates at seminar course.
To earn an evaluation from the intern supervisor with average "agree" level recommendation.
